about_the_game:
WARNING: This game contains flashing lights, loud sounds, and lots of jumpscares.

Description

The Wallway is a cooperative first-person horror game for 1-5 players. Explore endless hallways, collect important items and find your way out. Run away from the terrible monster that hears your every sound through the microphone. Can you escape or are you consumed by darkness and fear?

What is your challenge?

The Wallway takes place in endless corridors where there are several different items that allow you to get out of the endless corridors and also help you defend yourself against the killer who decides to kill you and maybe even succeeds. Be careful though, the killer can hear your voice from the microphone, so you have to be quiet.

Can you do it?

  • Playability
    The Wallway has simple controls for surviving in the cornfield yet everything will be explained to you.

  • Online co-op for 1-5 players
    You can play The Wallway alone or together with your friends. Up to 5 of you can play together.

  • Repeatability
    The full version of The Wallway offers many different maps and game modes. You'll never find yourself running out of things to do, thanks to random events you'll be scared forever.

  • Game Modes and Difficulty
    In addition to several The Wallway maps, the full version also offers several game modes and difficulties.

  • Features in multiplayer mode
    Take advantage of voice chat that reacts to distance from others. Be careful though, the killer can hear you too and will come after you!

Multiplayer

In addition to the single player mode, The Wallway also offers multiplayer for up to 5 players. In some situations, you'll have to work together to survive this nightmare and escape without getting killed by the monster.

name: THE WALLWAY

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950/Radeon R7 370 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game should work even on worse components than those listed.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4590 or AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1060/Radeon RX 580 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
